{{ddcl|
char_type widen( char c ) const;
}}

Converts a character {{c|c}} to its equivalent in the current locale. The result is converted from {{c/core|char}} to character type used within the stream if needed.

Effectively calls {{c|std::use_facet&lt; std::ctype&lt;char_type&gt; &gt;(getloc()).widen(c)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|character to convert}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Character converted to {{tt|char_type}}
